name: tomasborsje.github.io
description: This website was built with React with additional support for multiple self-contained apps on sub-pages.

name: Duskfall
description: An MMORPG server written entirely from scratch in Java using the Minestom API, integrated with a MongoDB database for data storage. Items, enemies, and spawn locations are fully data driven.

name: Duskfall-Legacy
description: The first iteration of my Minecraft + Spigot MMORPG. Has quests, a map compass, crafting, recipe unlocking, fake player NPCs, projectiles, a MongoDB database, custom mob AI, and more! Check out the showcase below.

name: OpenModularTurrets Reloaded
description: A rewrite of the popular OpenModularTurrets mod for Minecraft 1.21.

name: Rain Worldle
description: Guess from a list of Rain World characters, changing daily! Inspired by New York Times's 'Wordle', and hosted on /rainworldle.

name: SlugCraft
description: A Forge mod for Minecraft 1.20.1 that adds Rain World-based items, mechanics, and a fully fledged 'battle-royale' system.

name: WingTech
description: A Minecraft Forge mod that adds a json-based customisable tea system, a few machines, and more.

name: Aetherium
description: Terraria mod for tModLoader, written in C#. Adds a few unique items + a boss fight.

name: VoxelGame
description: A Minecraft clone created in Unity with C#. Has support for procedural world generation, crafting, saving + loading, and more.

name: LeagueBot
description: A computer-vision powered bot that also uses the League of Legends API to play the game. Written in C#.

name: TetrisGym
description: An ml-agents 'gym' set up for machine learning agents to learn the popular game Tetris.
